Title: Halter Neck Twisted Ruching Evening Dress

----

Sku: KD011

----

Price:

Bulkdiscount: 0

Sizes: 10, 12, 14, 6, 4, 8

----

Colors: navy, peach

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: KD011-navy-halter-neck-twisted-ruching-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This floor length gown has a halter neckline that is lined with rhinestones. The ruching detail is twisted at the waistline adding a sweet detail to the gown. The back of the dress is backless with two rhinestone horizontal straps. Completed with a slight slit in the front, this dress is great for all types of occasions.
